urls.title: Azar faulted workers' 'home and social' conditions for meatpacking outbreaks
urls.description: On a call with members of Congress, health secretary defended conditions inside the meat plants, three participants say.

text: Health Secretary Alex Azar defended working conditions in meatpacking plants on a phonecall with lawmakers, saying workers were more likely to catch coronavirus based on their social interactions and group living situations https://t.co/l31ZVUVfPR
